com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class DataBarStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.DataBarStyle

  • public final class DataBarStyle
extends Object
    Represents an appearance settings of a data bar.

      • getAxisColor

        public SpreadsheetColor getAxisColor()
        Gets the data bar axis color.
        Returns:
        The data bar axis color.

      • getAxisPosition

        public DataBarAxisPosition getAxisPosition()
        Gets the data bar axis position.
        Returns:
        The data bar axis position.

      • getBorderColor

        public SpreadsheetColor getBorderColor()

        Gets the data bar border color.

        If border color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar won't have any border.

        Returns:
        The data bar border color.

      • getDirection

        public DataBarDirection getDirection()
        Gets the data bar direction.
        Returns:
        The data bar direction.

      • getFillColor

        public SpreadsheetColor getFillColor()
        Gets the data bar fill color.
        Returns:
        The data bar fill color.

      • getNegativeBorderColor

        public SpreadsheetColor getNegativeBorderColor()

        Gets the data bar border color for negative values.

        If negative data bar border color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar border color for negative values is same as for positive values.

        Returns:
        The data bar border color for negative values.

      • getNegativeFillColor

        public SpreadsheetColor getNegativeFillColor()

        Gets the data bar fill color for negative values.

        If negative data bar fill color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar fill color for negative values is same as for positive values.

        Returns:
        The data bar fill color for negative values.

      • isGradientFill

        public boolean isGradientFill()

        Gets a value indicating whether the data bar fill color is gradient or solid.

        Default value is false (data bar fill color is solid).

        Returns:
        true if the data bar fill color is gradient; otherwise, false.

      • setAxisColor

        public void setAxisColor(SpreadsheetColor axisColor)
        Sets the data bar axis color.
        Parameters:
        axisColor - The data bar axis color.

      • setAxisPosition

        public void setAxisPosition(DataBarAxisPosition value)
        Sets the data bar axis position.
        Parameters:
        value - The data bar axis position.

      • setBorderColor

        public void setBorderColor(SpreadsheetColor borderColor)

        Sets the data bar border color.

        If border color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar won't have any border.

        Parameters:
        borderColor - The data bar border color.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(DataBarDirection value)
        Sets the data bar direction.
        Parameters:
        value - The data bar direction.

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(SpreadsheetColor fillColor)
        Sets the data bar fill color.
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The data bar fill color.

      • setGradientFill

        public void setGradientFill(boolean gradientFill)

        Sets a value indicating whether the data bar fill color is gradient or solid.

        Default value is false (data bar fill color is solid).

        Parameters:
        gradientFill - true if the data bar fill color is gradient; otherwise, false.

      • setNegativeBorderColor

        public void setNegativeBorderColor(SpreadsheetColor negativeBorderColor)

        Sets the data bar border color for negative values.

        If negative data bar border color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar border color for negative values is same as for positive values.

        Parameters:
        negativeBorderColor - The data bar border color for negative values.

      • setNegativeFillColor

        public void setNegativeFillColor(SpreadsheetColor negativeFillColor)

        Sets the data bar fill color for negative values.

        If negative data bar fill color SpreadsheetColor.isEmpty(), then data bar fill color for negative values is same as for positive values.

        Parameters:
        negativeFillColor - The data bar fill color for negative values.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a String that represents this DataBarStyle instance.

        This method should be used primarily for debugging purposes and should be considered volatile (format of its return value might change in future versions).
